name: Representation of the Ukrainian Orthodox Church Kyiv Patriarchate to the European Institutions
bossPosition: Representative of the UOC KP to the European Institutions
goal:
The aim of the Representation of the Ukrainian Orthodox Church Kyiv Patriarchate to the European Institutions is:

- to follow and analyse debate in the EU institutions with regards to the area of interest;
- to serve as a contact point between the UOC-KP and other interested;
- to establish the official dialogue with the EU institutions in the framework of the Lisbon Treaty (Article 17 TFEU)
interests: Communication, Culture, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Protection of human rights and freedoms, the right to freedom of conscience and religion, inter-religious dialogue, peacekeeping, charitable social activities.
